translations: vt.糟蹋；拙笨地修补；拙劣地拼凑
vi.拙笨地修补；弄坏某事物
n.难看的补缀；笨拙的修补；笨拙的工作

phrs.translation: 劣等蛋白石, 拙笨地修补, 别别扭扭
弄坏某事, 做事拙劣

sentences.sentence: They were victims of a computer botch-up.
sentences.translation: 他们是电脑一团糟的受害者。

sentences.sentence: I've made a real botch of the decorating.
sentences.translation: 我的装潢工作做得实在是糟糕。

sentences.sentence: I hate having builders botch up repairs on my house.
sentences.translation: 我痛恨建筑工人笨手笨脚地修理我的房子。
